thread.title: Repsly Offers Free Productivity Features to Individual Reps
thread.title_full: Repsly Offers Free Productivity Features to Individual Reps

author: Repsly
title: Repsly Offers Free Productivity Features to Individual Reps
text:
BOSTON , Sept. 22,    Repsly , a B2B mobile cloud solution provider that simplifies field management and increases field team effectiveness, today announced the availability of a free edition of the Repsly application for mobile workers. This edition will include the productivity tools that help field reps organize on-site visits, document their activity and report to management - allowing them to work more efficiently and deliver greater results.   Field reps face myriad challenges today, many still working with outdated spreadsheets or even clipboards and paper, while trying to deliver top customer service in an effective way. With the mobile workforce increasingly coming from a demographic that grew up on digital, having an application that leverages technology to streamline workflow can be extremely impactful. Consumerization of standard business technologies is changing the way many organizations approach day-to-day tasks, and mobile workforces can get the most value from solutions with highly-intuitive user interfaces.  
Repsly provides team managers with real-time visibility into the field, and streamlines organization and reporting  for field reps so they can focus on delivering strong customer service. The new free offering for individual reps allows Repsly to expand its reach and bring its platform to a wider range of individuals who are looking for a simplified way to work through their day-to-day responsibilities, and share the results of their work with anyone.  
Individual reps can leverage a subset of Repsly features to be more organized, report their results to management and stand out from colleagues by better documenting and sharing results of their work. Specific features include: 
Client Information Management : organize client information in a personalized way with an unlimited number of customizable fields, and classify clients using tags and statuses Visit Scheduling : manage schedules and document visits, and access summary reports by client to assess visit productivity Mobile Forms : completely customize forms for collecting any kind of data about clients, including photos, signatures and structured and free-form data, and share that data with managers, clients and co-workers Photo Capture : share, tag and analyze pictures from site visits while capturing other relevant data including time, date and GPS location Reporting : generate summary reports to share data collected, and analyze how effectively time was spent "We're excited to offer Repsly to individual reps who want to be better organized and more efficient while in the field. Repsly's personal edition gives them all of the super intuitive productivity features that the full version offers, and saves the pieces that optimize team collaboration and management for the paid version," said Matthew Brogie , COO of Repsly. "Field teams today have a unique opportunity to leverage mobile technology to redefine the workflow of their day-to-day activity and we've seen our platform drive incredible results across organizations - from small groups to large, global companies - and now we're offering that power to individuals as well." 
"Repsly enabled us to really overhaul our whole field strategy and very quickly became an integral part of our workflow. I don't know that we could ever see going back to business before Repsly. By being able to see what each of my reps are doing each day and understand how each customer visit went, I have the ability to ensure the team is productive and that we're sharing the important information that will help us meet our goals," said  Stephen Juarez , Divisional Sales Manager, Power Crunch. "I'd recommend Repsly to anyone who might be looking for a way to streamline field team activities and think that by giving individual reps access to a subset of features, Repsly will soon see many field managers who want to try the full version out."
Interested reps can access the free edition via the Apple App Store and Google Play Store . Information on the full version of Repsly's platform can be found at www.repsly.com where a free trial is available. 
About Repsly
Repsly, Inc. is a business-to-business software as a service (SaaS) company that provides a highly intuitive mobile/cloud solution for simplifying field activity management. With customers in over 40 countries, Repsly targets organizations with field reps that visit their clients to perform customer service, sales and field marketing functions, such as taking replenishment orders, merchandising products on retail shelves, marketing for referrals or performing regular maintenance. Deployed by leading global brands as well as innovative start-ups, Repsly enables organizations to improve the efficiency of their field teams, and greatly simplifies the collection and analysis of field data. As a result, Repsly's solution helps organizations create a tight connection between the field and back-office operations. Founded in 2010, Repsly is headquartered in Boston. For more information please visit the company's website,  www.repsly.com .
